scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises letters, a bill for whiskey, an agreement between Henry P. McGrath and Calvin Cogswell Morgan to sell a lot, a promissory note for $554, and an official protest of a note by the National Park Bank to H.P. McGrath and C.C. Morgan. Two letters to H.P. McGrath and C.C. Morgan discuss business matters. John P. Kennedy gave condolences to Elizabeth Phoebe Key Howard following the death of her husband, Charles Howard (June 24, 1869).
